metadata.title: CVE-2024-5197 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: There exists interger overflows in libvpx in versions prior to1.14.1. Calling vpx_img_alloc() with a large value of the d_w, d_h, oralign parameter may result in integer overflows in the calculations ofbuffer sizes and offsets and some fields of the returned vpx_image_t structmay be invalid. Calling vpx_img_wrap() with a large value of the d_w, d_h,or stride_align parameter may result in integer overflows in thecalculations of buffer sizes and offsets and some fields of the returnedvpx_image_t struct may be invalid. We recommend upgrading to version 1.14.1or beyond

criterions.comment: libvpx package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
